metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14630 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
In sam2p 0.49.3, an integer overflow exists in the pcxLoadImage24 functionof the file in_pcx.cpp, leading to an invalid write operation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14630` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sam2p - 0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: sam2p package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.14.04.1').
